title: sollaDi pashumkiLiyE
sahitya:
sollaDi pashumkiLiyE en shOkam taNikkum mana mOhanan pugazhaiyE


anupallavi

  ellai illAdavan ennuyir Anavan EkanAyakan shuddha bhOga nAyakan pugazh


caraNam    kaNNukkuL irundE nAn kANAdu kATTuvOn karaNattil oLind-anbuk-kaviyAga mITTuvOn
viNNilum maNNilum viLaiyATTu shEi avan viparam teriyumunnE kavarnda shubha nAyakan
